sections.text:
ShangshuWu,ZongdeKou,QingquanLai , Si Lan , ShyamSwaroopKatnagallu, Horst Hahn , Shabnam Taheriniya, Gerhard Wilde , Herbert Gleiter & Tao Feng
The original version of this Article contained an error in the Acknowledgements, in which the grant number for National Natural Science Foundation of China was previously incorrectly given as ‘55001166’. The correct version states ‘52001166’ in place of ‘55001166’. This has been corrected in both the PDF and HTML versions of the Article.

title: Author Correction: Dislocation exhaustion and ultra-hardening of nanograined metals by phase transformation at grain boundaries
